actions.text: Introduced in the Senate, read twice, considered, read the third time, and passed without amendment by Unanimous Consent.
Message on Senate action sent to the House.

actions.committee: Committee on Resources, and in addition to the Committee on the Judiciary, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned
actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Resources, and in addition to the Committee on the Judiciary, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

actions.subcommittee: Courts, the Internet, and Intellectual Property
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Courts, the Internet, and Intellectual Property.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Courts, the Internet, and Intellectual Property

official_title: A bill to reauthorize certain provisions relating to Indian tribal justice systems.

summary.text: Amends the Indian Tribal Justice Technical and Legal Assistance Act of 2000 to reauthorize for FY 2005 through FY 2010 certain provisions relating to: (1) training and technical assistance and civil and criminal legal assistance grants; and (2) tribal justice systems.

titles.title: A bill to reauthorize certain provisions relating to Indian tribal justice systems.
